text: We're going to be looking at module 6 which is my absolute most important and favourite module out of the entire course. The very first Price Ladder course that I designed and conceptualised never had this module in and it's again so critically important if you understand what the message i'm communicating here it'll really stand you in a good stead and and provide you that platform to launch yourself into becoming a really professional price ladder trader and that is in module six where we'll be focusing on auctioning exchange and market velocity
